title: Diff'rent Strokes star Danny Cooksey's wife takes out a restraining order after filing for divorce
text:
Diff'rent Strokes star Danny Cooksey's separation with his wife of more than 20 years is quickly turning messy.

It was announced earlier this week that Amber Cooksey filed for divorce from the child actor.

And now, it appears that Amber is seeking a restraining order against Danny, claiming that he's exasperated her epilepsy, according to TMZ.

Restraining order: Diff'rent Strokes star Danny Cooksey's wife Amber is seeking a restraining order, having filed for divorce earlier this week

According to TMZ, Amber accused Danny of lashing out at her with profanity during phone calls in which he accused her of having multiple affairs.

She also claimed that he began cursing at her during a recent curbside custody exchange, when their eight-year-old son Jackson bit her and called her a 'bi***.'

Court documents also cite another incident, in which Danny sent Jackson into her house with the sole purpose of catching her having an affair.

She also accused him of following her two a grocery store and taking photos of her license plate.

Potty mouth: According to TMZ, Amber accused Danny of lashing out at her with profanity during phone calls in which he accused her of having multiple affairs

Bad influence: She also claimed that he began cursing at her during a recent curbside custody exchange, when their eight-year-old son Jackson bit her and called her a 'bi***'

Sole custody: Danny and Amber share daughter Zoe, 21, and son Jackson, of whom Amber is asking for sole legal and physical custody, with visitation rights for Danny

Amber claimed the 'high conflict and stress' of the situation has had negative affects on her epilpsy.

In addition, she accused Danny of feeding Jackson (who also has epilepsy) donuts and cookies, which can also impact the condition.

Amber filed a legal divorce petition earlier this week, citing irreconcilable differences, according to TMZ.

Danny and Amber share daughter Zoe, 21, and son Jackson, of whom Amber is asking for sole legal and physical custody, with visitation rights for Danny.

She's also asking the court to award her spousal support, block Danny's attempt at getting spousal support from her, and change back to her maiden name of Leigh.

Danny is most known for his role in Diff'rent Strokes, also having appeared in Terminator 2 and doing voice work in Tiny Toon Adventures, Salute Your Shorts and The Lorax.
description: Amber filed a legal divorce petition earlier this week, citing irreconcilable differences after 20 years of marriage. In addition, she is asking for sole legal and physical custody, with visitation rights for Danny.
